archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.6d: d) capable of considering the context of information (e.g. factors such as time, sender, receiver, subject heading, message content and file attachments) to help identify information at risk of disclosure
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
